text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly explains that the protection of the EU market is achieved via the concept of differentiated controls based on whether goods are 'at risk' of entering the EU (Red Lane) or destined for NI (Green Lane/UK Internal Market Scheme).
